name: minimalist-palette-web
description: A minimalist color palette web application

scripts.dev: npm run dev:ts & npm run dev:css
scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run copy:ts && npm run build:css
scripts.copy:ts: cp dist/config.js src/ && cp dist/state.js src/ && cp dist/domUtils.js src/ && cp dist/colorUtils.js src/ && cp dist/tooltips.js src/ && cp dist/importExport.js src/ && cp dist/default-palette.js src/
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
